name: Add new Printful orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Make will watch for new Printful orders at regular intervals and add them to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rlw52vfgV_XxpH-P3Wabv3t-g9W8Zow7WzRxjycEgSs/edit?usp=sharing).
